name: Wizzauna
description:
Wizzauna is my entry for the VimJam 3 this year, with the theme of Turn Up The Heat.

In the game, you're a young wizard that manages a magical sauna. You can open the amount of saunas your wealth permits you, and once you open the queue to public, customers will start arriving, with a need for a specific heat range. Take them to a sauna of your choice, set the heat to the desired and wait for them to get out satisfied... or not!

Almost everything in this game was made by me. I didn't have time to finish the music, more SFX and the customer's 3D models, but for a small prototype it's fine :D

- Fire Particles (by Sirhaian'Arts).

- Milky Coffee Font (by Khurasan)

- Fantasy Skybox FREE (In the Unity Asset Store by Render Knight)

Controls:

- Movement = Arrow Keys

- Main Action Buttons: Z, X, C

Almost 3 years ago I completely stopped game development and with this jam I've been able to do some once again, and I'm pretty proud of what came out.  It's a pitty I couldn't spend more time on it (3D modeling took the most time xd), but I'm pretty happy of comming back to game development and doing this kind of stuff!
